name: Labrador Retriever
description: Friendly, outgoing, and high-spirited, this breed is known for its good nature.

name: German Shepherd
description: Confident, courageous, and smart, this breed is extremely faithful and obedient.

name: Golden Retriever
description: Intelligent, friendly, and devoted, this breed is one of the most popular family dogs.

name: French Bulldog
description: Adorable, affectionate, and playful, this breed is a great companion for city dwellers.
